name: Select Similar
description:
Selects canvas nodes by common features, such as:

– Relative Layer Position.

– Layer Type.

– Layer Name.

– Font Name.

– Fill.

– Stroke.

– Width and Height.

– Locked.

– Layer Visibility.

– Text Content.

– Missing Fonts.

– Multiple Fonts.

– Detached instances.


Order of actions:

- Select the comparison parameters.

- Select the sample layer (multiple layers are possible).

- Select the group(s) / frame (s) to search in. If you don't select it, the search will be global.

- Select!


Demonstration: twitter.com/AndreslavKozlov
